block.p: Robert A. and Roberta Greenberg of New Rochelle, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Bonnie Jill Greenberg to Scott Michael Stern, the son of Emanuel and Lana Stern of Commack, L.I. A November wedding is planned.

Miss Greenberg, 25 years old, is an audience-research analyst for Seltel Inc., a television advertising representative company in New York. She graduated from Long Island University. Her father is an independent financial planner in New York. Her mother is the associate dean of students at Monroe College in the Bronx.

Robert A. and Roberta Greenberg of New Rochelle, N.Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter Bonnie Jill Greenberg to Scott Michael Stern, the son of Emanuel and Lana Stern of Commack, L.I. A November wedding is planned.

Miss Greenberg, 25 years old, is an audience-research analyst for Seltel Inc., a television advertising representative company in New York. She graduated from Long Island University. Her father is an independent financial planner in New York. Her mother is the associate dean of students at Monroe College in the Bronx.

Mr. Stern, also 25, is a certified public accountant and a senior associate with the New York accounting firm of Coopers & Lybrand. He graduated from the State University of New York at Albany. His mother is an elementary-school teacher at the Mandracchia-Sawmill Intermediate School in Commack. His father is the owner of Favorite Stationery, a store in Commack.
